attributes.action: VOTE OF NO CONFIDENCE FOR THIS GOVERNMENT
attributes.additional_details: I call on the people of this Country to give a vote of no confidence for David Cameron and his Coalition Government.If enough people back this e-petition then I call for David Cameron to resign as leader of this Government.As he once stated,let the people call him to account if they are not happy with his leadership.

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament not the Government
